Description:
Stunning game from the creators of the cult animated series South Park, Trey Parker and Matt Stone! Of fourth-party, arrange fierce battles in the schoolyard, exalted young hero who is destined to become the savior of South Park. Get ready, because you will find an epic saga about the struggle for ... steepness. 

For thousands of years have passed since the great opposition began humans and elves for the possession of a Stick of Truth. But everything will change soon! Rumors about the new kid, whose appearance was foretold by the stars scatter like wildfire. And worth the wheels touch the prophecy of a small town in Colorado, as you start your journey towards a legend. 

So make your way through the streets of South Park, fighting with people, crabs, underpants gnomes, hordes of hippies and other creatures of the Dark Forces. Take the weapons and equipment worthy of the greatest heroes of antiquity. Seek Truth Stick and have respect for the coolest guys in elementary school. You do not want to be called a loser all my life? 

The game will be released in Russian original English voiced c. The disc goes on sale at Jewel-box and the Collector's Edition Ã‚Â«South Park: Stick of Truth. Grand Wizard Edition Ã‚Â». Estimated release date - March 6, 2014.
